mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (nt_seq, nt_title, nt_writer, nt_content,nt_imp) VALUES(nextval('nt_seq'), #{nt_title}, #{nt_writer}, #{nt_content},#{nt_imp})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM notice WHERE 1=1
AND nt_title LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND nt_content LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
order by nt_seq desc
mapper.update: update notice set nt_count=nt_count+1 WHERE nt_seq=#{nt_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY nt_seq LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{startList}
